allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update .claude/settings.local.json with project permissions

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Rebrand from Clawdbot to OpenClaw; reorganize repo structure and update project docs

- Rename all Clawdbot references to OpenClaw across CLAUDE.md, system-specifications.md, README.md, .gitignore
- Move files into archive/, docs/, scripts/ directories; remove BOOTSTRAP.md and check-calendar.cjs
- Flesh out USER.md with Jonathan''s context, goals, and schedule
- Update README.md project tree to reflect current structure
- Simplify TOOLS.md \(remove domain whitelist\)
EOF
\)")
